treatments_requested.name: Paraffin Therapy
treatments_requested.other_or_notes: Home wax bath kit/portable paraffin bath unit

guidelines_details: Paraffin wax treatment is widely used for hand-related diseases and is effective in raising tissue temperature and maintaining it longer than other methods.
soc_details: Paraffin wax bath therapy is commonly used in conjunction with physical therapy to enhance hand functionality and relieve pain.

study_details.key_findings: Paraffin wax bath treatment is more effective at raising and maintaining tissue temperature compared to other methods.

rationale: The paraffin wax bath therapy is medically necessary for the enrollee's refractory hand pain and functional limitations associated with lupus, as it enhances hand functionality and complements physical therapy.
reviewer_credentials: Board certified in physical medicine and rehabilitation and pain management, actively practicing with expertise in treating similar conditions.
